name: NPR
text:
RT @SachaPfeiffer: Non-Trump news, but still absolutely bonkers:

A new judge in the 9/11 case in Guant√°namo Bay, Cuba, quit after 2 weeks.

It's the latest Gitmo fiasco and makes it nearly impossible to hold a trial before the 20th anniversary of the September 11 attacks.
